medical_history.chief_complaint: Abdominal pain localized to the right upper quadrant.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The discomfort began 6 months earlier and was described as constant pressure unrelated to food intake, associated with intermittent nausea and vomiting.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Type 1 diabetes mellitus, hypothyroidism, psoriasis, seizure disorder, juvenile rheumatoid arthritis.
medical_history.social_history: Smoked seven cigarettes a day for 10 years, works as a nurse, does not use alcohol or illicit drugs, not sexually active.
